CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Contract Signed stage positioned above or below the Proposal Sent stage?
SRP.A: The Contract Signed stage is positioned {below} the Proposal Sent stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {exponential} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Negotiation?
VE.A: The value of stage Negotiation is {161}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Initial Contact?
VE.A: The value of stage Initial Contact is {648}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Needs Analysis?
VE.A: The value of stage Needs Analysis is {431}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Initial Contact, with a value of {648}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Contract Signed, with a value of {137}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Initial Contact to stage Needs Analysis?
SC.A: Decreased by {217} Clients from stage Initial Contact to stage Needs Analysis.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Needs Analysis to stage Proposal Sent?
SC.A: Decreased by {167} Clients from stage Needs Analysis to stage Proposal Sent.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Negotiation to stage Contract Signed?
SC.A: Decreased by {24} Clients from stage Negotiation to stage Contract Signed.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 347? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Initial Contact} stage has {648}, the {Needs Analysis} stage has {431}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 347? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Proposal Sent} stage has {264}, the {Negotiation} stage has {161}, the {Contract Signed} stage has {137}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 149 and 347? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Proposal Sent} stage has {264}, the {Negotiation} stage has {161}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Negotiation to Contract Signed, or from stage Initial Contact to Needs Analysis?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Initial Contact} to {Needs Analysis} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Negotiation to Contract Signed, from stage Initial Contact to Needs Analysis, or from stage Needs Analysis to Proposal Sent?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Initial Contact} to stage {Needs Analysis} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Initial Contact} and {Needs Analysis} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Negotiation} and {Contract Signed} stages.
